text: Anders Jonny Ferm (20 February 1938 – 1 October 2019) was a Swedish diplomat and social democratic politician. Ferm was an important adviser to Prime Minister Olof Palme,Olof Palme – 20 år senare, Fokus 2006-02-24 and was Sweden's UN-ambassador from 1982 to 1988 and later its ambassador to Denmark. == References == Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Swedish Social Democratic Party politicians Category:Permanent Representatives of Sweden to the United Nations Category:Ambassadors of Sweden to Denmark
title: Anders Ferm
